titleStmt.title: A defence of the absolution given to Sr. William Perkins, at the place of execution, April the 3d with a further vindication thereof, occasioned by a paper, entituled A declararion of the sense of the arch-bishops and bishops, &c.
titleStmt.author: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726.
